short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AudioWatcher mutes & unmutes audio from a set tab when other browser-based audio is detected

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AudioWatcher automatically mutes & unmutes audio from a designated tab when other browser-based audio is detected. Particularly useful when listening to background music while working / studying. 

To ensure AudioWatcher works correctly, please refresh any active tabs that may have been opened prior to downloading.

The code for this project is open source and can be found here:
https://github.com/JonWakefield/AudioWatcher
